casebody.data:
Harry Buckley, appellee, v. Edgewater Beach Hotel Company et al., defendants, on appeal of James McAlvany, appellant.Gen. No. 31,930.Heard in the third division of this court for the first district at the March term, 1927.

Taylor, P. J., dissents.

Opinion filed January 18, 1928.Brundage, Landon & Holt and Foreman, Bluford, Steele & Schultz, for appellant; Benson Landon, of counsel.Litsinger, Healy & Reid, for appellee. Mr. Justice Wilson

delivered the opinion of the court.
